reviews.productTitle: 2Pack SOZULAMP Illuminated Light Switch-Single Pole Wall Switch with Night Light, 15A 120/277V,3 Wire, Grounding Screw, Glossy White
reviews.text: Easy to install, works fine. Of note: the LED light fixture in the powder room I used this in lights just a little. I guess it is below the minimum required to keep it from lighting. However, it only lights a few of its LED diodes not all of them so just a little more light in this very dark room. I purchased several more of these.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2025
reviews.title: Work as advertised

reviews.productTitle: 2Pack SOZULAMP Illuminated Light Switch-Single Pole Wall Switch with Night Light, 15A 120/277V,3 Wire, Grounding Screw, Glossy White
reviews.text: I like the look of this contemporary switch. Other illuminated switches seem to have a black cluster appearance. This has a tech look to it and has five rectangular LED segments at the top that emit white light. I imagine you could put the lights aiming downwards if you prefer with a single pole action would be opposite. It would be great if they made a three-way switch as well. But the photocell on the switch, we can see the little hole for it works well. It is so useful in trying to find a light switch in the dark. Seems to be on average quality with any other switch you can buy in a big box Store. Not spec grade however, good for residential.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2025
reviews.title: Innovative, nightlight type switch.

reviews.productTitle: 2Pack SOZULAMP Illuminated Light Switch-Single Pole Wall Switch with Night Light, 15A 120/277V,3 Wire, Grounding Screw, Glossy White
reviews.text: They are ok, but the light on them are not bright you can't really see at night.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2024

reviews.productTitle: 2Pack SOZULAMP Illuminated Light Switch-Single Pole Wall Switch with Night Light, 15A 120/277V,3 Wire, Grounding Screw, Glossy White
reviews.text: This led night light switches stopped working after four months. No customer service number available. One switch stopped working no light.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2024

reviews.productTitle: 2Pack SOZULAMP Illuminated Light Switch-Single Pole Wall Switch with Night Light, 15A 120/277V,3 Wire, Grounding Screw, Glossy White
reviews.text: We bought this Dec. 2, 2023 and now it’s Sept. 21, 2024, not even a year later, and the nightlight part has already quit working. It was great while it was working. I didn’t have to “hunt” for the light switch when I wanted to turn on the light and, plus, it was a great nightlight for going to the bathroom in the middle of the night. I really expected it to last a lot longer than this, especially with it being electric and not battery operated. Very disappointing!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2024
reviews.title: Disappointed

reviews.productTitle: 2Pack SOZULAMP Illuminated Light Switch-Single Pole Wall Switch with Night Light, 15A 120/277V,3 Wire, Grounding Screw, Glossy White
reviews.text: Incredible amount of light for the small area where the lights are. Shines up or down, which is nice so you can orient the switch whichever way you want. The day/night sensor (the tiny hole in the switch) is sensitive. Sometimes walking past will make the light come on, but no big thing. Now I don't have to try to walk around in the dark!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2024
reviews.title: Awesome

reviews.productTitle: 2Pack SOZULAMP Illuminated Light Switch-Single Pole Wall Switch with Night Light, 15A 120/277V,3 Wire, Grounding Screw, Glossy White
reviews.text: I’m used to light switches installed where pushing to top in turns it on and the lower end to turn the light off. These have to be installed upside down to that to have the LEDs pointing down. They will work well either way.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2024
reviews.title: Install was not normal.

reviews.productTitle: 2Pack SOZULAMP Illuminated Light Switch-Single Pole Wall Switch with Night Light, 15A 120/277V,3 Wire, Grounding Screw, Glossy White
reviews.text: A few days after installation one appears dimmer than the other but still they work great. Make sure your electrician installs the correctly, my electrician wasn't paying attention and installed them with the light facing up instead of down the way I wanted. Still, they are a great little night light. I plan to buy more for other areas of the house.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2024
reviews.title: I love them...

reviews.productTitle: 2Pack SOZULAMP Illuminated Light Switch-Single Pole Wall Switch with Night Light, 15A 120/277V,3 Wire, Grounding Screw, Glossy White
reviews.text: I saw this and thought it would solve the issue we have in our bath. I did not want a night light in the hallway as I like it dark. This worked as it does not have too much light, just the right amount on the wall in the bath. The only thing is you have to get use to the rocker switch being in the opposite direction than the norm. It is a great product and recommend it.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2024
reviews.title: Great device, just what we needed

reviews.text: Works great. Not only does it help you find the switch, it is also a nice night light. The light LEDs are located in the top of the switch toggle (see pictures) which projects the light up the wall and reflex off of the ceiling.

reviews.productTitle: 2Pack SOZULAMP Illuminated Light Switch-Single Pole Wall Switch with Night Light, 15A 120/277V,3 Wire, Grounding Screw, Glossy White
reviews.text: My light switch is in a room that has a skylight but, is very dark at night. I liked this product because i believed it would help at night but not keep the LED lights on all day like some other models (bathroom light switches for instance). My only complaint is that i wish the light sensor was a little better. I sometimes find it on around 3pm when there is enough light in the room. My expectation was that it would only turn on at little (5pm-6pm) to no light. The LED lights are not as bright as advertised but, still good. Actually prefer it because when i get up to use the bathroom at night, the light is not as bright, as say a iphone flash light.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.title: Not as bright as advertised but, still good.

reviews.productTitle: 2Pack SOZULAMP Illuminated Light Switch-Single Pole Wall Switch with Night Light, 15A 120/277V,3 Wire, Grounding Screw, Glossy White
reviews.text: Simple to install , no need for a neutral. It passes through the light bulb.

reviews.productTitle: 2Pack SOZULAMP Illuminated Light Switch-Single Pole Wall Switch with Night Light, 15A 120/277V,3 Wire, Grounding Screw, Glossy White
reviews.text: I love it when what I order from Amazon arrives and is ACTUALLY exactly as expected! I think we've all experienced - at LEAST once - the disappointment that comes of receiving your order and, although it does look like the pictures, just isn't *quite* how you were expecting it to be. So it was very satisfying when it turned out that this one looks like and functions precisely as anticipated. I wholeheartedly believe in giving credit where it's due (not just complaints and dissatisfaction) so I'm giving my 👍👍 two thumbs up and 🫡 solute of approval to the manufacturer as well as yourself, the inquiring, potential customer that this product is 👌 A-OK.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.title: Exactly as pictured and described

reviews.productTitle: 2Pack SOZULAMP Illuminated Light Switch-Single Pole Wall Switch with Night Light, 15A 120/277V,3 Wire, Grounding Screw, Glossy White
reviews.text: This seemed like a great buy for the price to help with a dark hallway but the first fell apart when my friend who is a electrician was installing. He said he wouldn't feel comfortable having something like that in his house and advised me to go to the store and buy on other than installing the second one.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2023
reviews.title: I really shouldn't be suprised.

reviews.productTitle: 2Pack SOZULAMP Illuminated Light Switch-Single Pole Wall Switch with Night Light, 15A 120/277V,3 Wire, Grounding Screw, Glossy White
reviews.text: My mom needed a little light, a little something so she could get a drink of water in the middle of the night. This works absolutely perfect. Just enough for her to see the floor in front of her on her way to the kitchen. Best part she doesn't have to turn the light on that she finds too bright. Installation was simple and fit a standard switch cover so I didn't have to buy a new one of those. Can't speak to longevity but I will update if any issues come up. I would recommend these.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2023
reviews.title: Cool !

reviews.productTitle: 2Pack SOZULAMP Illuminated Light Switch-Single Pole Wall Switch with Night Light, 15A 120/277V,3 Wire, Grounding Screw, Glossy White

reviews.productTitle: 2Pack SOZULAMP Illuminated Light Switch-Single Pole Wall Switch with Night Light, 15A 120/277V,3 Wire, Grounding Screw, Glossy White
reviews.text: Our bathroom switches are about a foot down the wall from the door, so we always fumbled to find the switch. Now with this illuminated switch, we can easily find it in the dark. The LEDs aren’t too bright at night (which is a plus), but they’re visible enough to find in the dark. My only issue was getting the LED to fire downward. So I removed the switch from the metal surround and flipped it. Not thrilled about it, since all the wires are on the same side now, but it works the way I want it ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2023
reviews.title: Light Shines “Up” by Default

reviews.productTitle: 2Pack SOZULAMP Illuminated Light Switch-Single Pole Wall Switch with Night Light, 15A 120/277V,3 Wire, Grounding Screw, Glossy White

reviews.text: The picture shows night like shining from bottom but the night shines from the top. It’s not installed upside down the on position is like a normal light switch only difference is the night like illuminates towards the ceiling. If you try to reverse it the switch the on position is opposite a normal switch. I should have returned it.
